channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023070480
item.description:
Report X-2023070480

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: FREDERICK
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE LEAKING ON RED BELT, RESPONDER CALLED. RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE RESPONSE SHEET, FOLLOWED PROPER CLEAN UP, AND PACKAGE TAKEN TO DMP

item.title: Report X-2023070393
item.description:
Report X-2023070393

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AN UNLOADER DISCOVERED A LEAKY SMELLY PACKAGE NEAR THE REAR DOOR OF TRAILER. THE LOADER NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR WHO THEN CALLED FOR A RESPONDER TO ADDRESS THE MATTER. THE RESPONDER ARRIVED IN FULL PE AND A DECISION TREE IN HAND. THE RESPONDER CONTAINED THE SPILL, CLEANED UP THE AREA AND SECURED THE DAMAGED PACKAGE IN A SPILL TRY FOR TRANSPORT TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023071225
item.description:
Report X-2023071225

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE CAME DOWN THE LOADSIDE CHUTE LEAKING DURING SORTATION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THIS WAS AN UNDECLARED CORROSIVE HAZMAT. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE AND THE SEAL WAS DEFECTIVE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

DescribePack: THE PLASTIC JUGS WERE CRUSHED AND ALL THE CAPS CAME LOOSE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023071162
item.description:
Report X-2023071162

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A manager discovered the hazmat box was wet and called for QA. We came and discovered the bottom of one bottle was dented and a small hole was leaking hydrochloric acid. We placed the hazardous items inside a hazmat tote and brought it to the QA area to be processed further. DescribePack: A small dent and hole in the bottom of one bottle. The second bottle in the box appears fine. But it was wet from the leaking bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: We wiped the floor clean of all the leaked acid and brought the hazardous materials to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023071075
item.description:
Report X-2023071075

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-14
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BEING UNLOADED OFF TRAILER AND WAS LEAKING WHITE PAINT. DescribePack: ONCE INSPECTED IT WAS SEEN THAT THE TOP ON THE PAINT CAN WAS LOOSE AND LEAKING OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: BOX WAS PLACED IN LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND PLACED UNDER VENTILATION SYSTEM. FOLD ABSORB WAS USED TO MITIGATE SPILL.

item.title: Report X-2023070071
item.description:
Report X-2023070071

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-07
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND THE PACKAGE LEAKING INSIDE THE TRAILER. THEN CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND TOOK THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA. UPON INSEPCTION, RESPONDER NOTICED THE CONTAINERS HAD A HAZARDOUS DIAMOND LABEL AND SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT. UPON CONFIRMATION FROM UPPER MANAGEMENT, THE PACKAGE WAS DECIDED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. CONTENTS WERE PROCESSED THROUGH DMP AND HAD TO BE DAMAGED FOR DISPOSAL

item.title: Report X-2023070032
item.description:
Report X-2023070032

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO TAN BELT FOR LEAKING HAZMAT WITH A CORROSIVE LABEL. RESPONDER, WITH FULL PPE, DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET, ARRIVED AND DISCOVERED PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS MARKED WITH AN OVERPACK AND A CORROSIVE LABEL. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE PROPER RESPONSE SHEET, CONTAINED THE SPILL AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING. LIQUID WAS RETAINED IN THE CARTON AND UPON OPENING CARTON RESPONDER DETERMINED INNER BUCKET WAS IN A CLOSED PLASTIC BAG WHICH CONTAINED THE LIQUID FROM SPREADING.

Report X-2023061374
